item.title: Installation
item.description:
Video Tutorial

Before Installation

Prerequisites

  • Ensure Thingsee Gateway is installed and operational (LED blinking green)
  • Plan sensor locations considering all measurement types needed
  • Prepare installation surface (clean and dry)
  • Select appropriate mounting method for use case

Network Coverage Planning

  • Maximum distance: 20m between sensors or to gateway
  • Use intermediate sensors as routers for distances > 20m
  • Account for signal attenuation from:
    • Fire doors and thick walls
    • Metal structures and equipment
    • Dense building materials

item.title: Operation
item.description:
Overview

Thingsee ENVIRONMENT operates continuously once installed, automatically measuring environmental parameters, motion, and magnetic field changes. This multipurpose sensor combines six sensor types, each with specific monitoring capabilities and applications.

Automatic Operation

Normal Operation

Once powered on and connected to Wirepas mesh network, Thingsee ENVIRONMENT:

  1. Measures continuously - All sensors active (temperature, humidity, pressure, light, accelerometer, magnetic switch)
  2. Reports changes - Event-driven when thresholds exceeded
  3. Sends periodic updates - Hourly heartbeat regardless of changes
  4. Manages power automatically - Optimizes battery life
  5. Self-heals network - Reconnects after temporary disruptions

No Manual Intervention Required

  • Fully autonomous operation
  • Automatic network reconnection
  • Self-adjusting for network conditions
  • Event-driven efficient reporting

Measurement Parameters

Temperature

Range: -40°C to +85°C
Operating Range: -20°C to +50°C (battery specification)
Accuracy: ±0.3°C
Event Threshold: 0.5°C absolute change (default)

item.title: Configuration
item.description:
Overview

Thingsee ENVIRONMENT sensors are preconfigured from the factory with optimal default settings for most applications. However, specific parameters can be adjusted remotely via Haltian IoT Studio or by contacting Haltian support for specialized configurations like Machine Usage Mode.

Default Configuration

Factory Settings

Out-of-the-box configuration:

Parameter Default Value Purpose
Measurement interval 5 minutes Continuous monitoring
Temperature threshold 0.5°C Sensitive change detection
Humidity threshold 2% RH Standard comfort monitoring
Pressure threshold 20 hPa Weather/HVAC changes
Light threshold 10,000 lux On/off detection
Accelerometer Position/orientation Standard mode
Magnetic switch State change counting Open/close tracking
Report interval (heartbeat) 1 hour Regular status updates
Battery report interval 6 hours Power monitoring

item.title: Specifications
item.description:
Product Overview

Model: Thingsee ENVIRONMENT
Product Code: TBD
Manufacturer: Haltian Oy, Finland
Purpose: Multipurpose environmental sensor with temperature, humidity, pressure, light, motion, and magnetic switch

Measurement Specifications

Temperature Sensor

Specification Value
Technology Digital semiconductor sensor
Measurement Range -40°C to +85°C
Operating Range -20°C to +50°C (battery specification)
Recommended Range -20°C to +50°C
Accuracy ±0.3°C
Resolution 0.01°C
Response Time (t63) < 10 seconds (in air)
Long-term Stability < 0.03°C/year

Humidity (Relative Humidity) Sensor

Specification Value
Technology Capacitive polymer sensor
Measurement Range 0 - 100% RH
Accuracy ±5% RH
Resolution 0.1% RH
Response Time (t63) < 8 seconds
Hysteresis ±1% RH
Long-term Stability < 0.5% RH/year

Note: Accuracy specification ±5% RH is typical for this sensor class. Suitable for comfort monitoring and general environmental tracking. Not suitable for precision metrology applications.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description:
Quick Diagnostics

Basic Checks

Before detailed troubleshooting:

  • Batteries installed correctly (polarity matched)
  • LED flashed on battery installation
  • Gateway operational (green blinking LED)
  • Sensor within 20m of gateway or another sensor
  • At least one heartbeat interval (1 hour) has passed

LED Indicators

  • Single flash on power-on: Normal operation startup
  • No continuous LED: Normal (battery conservation)

Note: Sensors do not have constant LED indication to maximize battery life.
